I:

Your Beauty lies in Sadness. Lonely, depressed and feeling broken.
For whatever reason, you see this world only for the bad that it holds carrying
the burdens of yourself and others. Some people like to be with you and your
unique vantage point when they are down, you are someone who can sympathize with
them. But you find yourself alone again when they seem to find a solution and
are happy again, yet you still are stuck in this rut. Do not worry, you will make
it out at some time. Everyone does, if you try. When you are seen all others want
to do is make your pain go away, but that is something only you can do. You
probably keep to yourself a lot and don't like to let people in, afraid to be hurt
again. You feel empty and helpless and your looks reflect that, often seen
with tears in your eyes.

Most of you who know me well know that my dad had lung cancer (no he doesn't smoke it was from agent orange from the vietnam war). i can remember him coming home from chemotherapy and radiation and just being so sick. his acid reflex was so bad that at my nana's funeral, his mom, he had a bottle of milanta in a brown bag because it was so bad. The last thing that i ever want is to have to see someone that i love dearly go through what my dad had to. 
I'm so terrified because Mike may have cancer... i love him with all of my heart, he has no idea, and i would hate to have to see him go through what my dad had too. Every night now i pray that he doesn't have cancer, and that the bumps are only related to stress. If he does, I'm gunna stay by his side and try to make him as happy & comfortable as possible. 
Baby if your reading this I want you to know that I love you with all of my heart and I'm never gunna leave your side, no matter what happens. I'm sorry if i've been a bitch lately, i'm just so stressed out about school, and i'm worried about you. I don't want anything to ever happen to you. I love you bobo and i always will.

Where Did Your Soul Originate?
brought to you by Quizilla
In your eyes, people can't seem to see anything
because your eyes are covered up by tears! You
are constantly hurt and depressed... No one
seems to understand how you feel because
everyone is scared to get close to you... You
long to be able to reach out and tell someone
everything, and all of your problems... But you
have no one to tell, or they just don't seem to
want to hear what you have to say. You've been
hurt many times that you don't seem to have any
tears left to shed, or if you do, they're an
endless river flowing... You've started to hide
and bottle up all or your problems and
feelings, hoping that maybe they just will go
away... You want company, but at the same time,
you're scared of it. Your sanctuary is your
room where you can just be alone and try to
throw away all of your aching pains. You're
dark and mysterious and people like you for
that reason. Even if you think you're all by
yourself in the dark, someone is always there
with you. Your special someone wants to admit
and show their feelings towards you, but
they're afraid of how you'll take it. Get out
more and enjoy life because, it is far too long
to frown your way through :)

Yea i haven't written in a wicked long time, and a lot of fucked up shit has happened.....the main one being that mi aunt ronnie is in the hospital with cancer.
every family,*i hope* has atleast one family member that doesn't have all their marbles with them, if u no wut i mean. don't get me wrong, i love mi aunt ronnie with all of mi heart, but she, as we all do, have our moments.  given the fact that she only lives up the street from me, she's become one of the few aunts that no me pretty well. she has a pool and as far back as i can remember, she's let me and mi brother swim in it when ever we wanted 2 during the summer. up until a couple of years ago, i always thought that she was in the hospital because she got sick real easily, but then i found out that she had cancer. now it's concidered rare for a person with cancer to over-come it once. well mi aunt's done it about eight tiems now. and no i am  not exagerating. it's come to the point that some of her hair won't grow back, like her eyebrows *she nows has tattoo eye brows, and no it is not cool*. 
when mi mom told me a couple of days ago that she had cancer again, i just dismissed it as if it was a common cold. the next day it really hit home when i found out that she not only had cancer, but double Pneumonia. it's bad enough to have pneumonia in one lung when ur healthy, but it a serious crisis when  u have it in both ur lungs, and while ur going through intensive chemotherapy and radiation. 
so mi mom and aunt barbara went 2 Florida to talk 2 mi aunt and c if there's any chance of getting her back up to boston so mi uncle tom, who's a doctor, can help her with her medical needs. i hate to admit this, but i'm really worred about her. i guess it's cuz when i was younger i was more nieve about cancer until mi dad had lung cancer, and until reciently, i didnt really know just how lucked it was for him to have gotten rid of it and 2 be cancer free for 5 years now. 
well its gettin late and i still have 2 more sections in a practice sat test that im supposed 2 have done for 2morrow, and i have 2 get up at 430 to visit colleges that are 3 hrs away.... good night 2 all, and please keep mi aunt in ur prayers......
